segments.text: Good morning . Your ticket and passport , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any baggage to check in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please put it on the scale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . By the way , can you tell me how many kilos of free baggage each passenger is allowed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The baggage allowance is different according to the class of your ticket . What class are you travelling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For a first-class passenger , the free baggage allowance is forty kilos .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many pieces of baggage can I carry on to the plane ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Passengers holding first class tickets may carry 2 pieces within the total weight of 5 kg onto the plane .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If my baggage exceeds the allowance , what should I do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the checked baggage is over the allowance , we will charge you for the overweight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Thank you very much for your information .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're welcome . Your boarding pass and baggage check , please .
segments.speaker: S1
